features: ✔️UPGRADED ERGONOMICS AND DESIGN: Long-term driving is prone to back or leg pain, our cushion's unique ergonomics and orthopedic design help relieve sciatica, pelvis, cheekbones or tailbone pain when driving; effectively reduce leg pain, fatigue and numbness, making your driving more comfortable.

✔️ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Long-term driving is prone to back pain, our cushion's unique ergonomics and orthopedic design help relieve sciatica, pelvis, cheekbones or tailbone pain; effectively reduce leg pain, fatigue and numbness, making Driving is more comfortable. To relieve the pressure on the tail, sciatica and prolonged sitting posture.

✔️BREATHABLE MESH FABRIC SURFACE: With high-quality breathable mesh fabric material as surface of the seat cushion. It will be no smell anymore even use in the summer days. Just can perfectly give you good experience in whichever season, and you can easily remove the fabric cover to do a wash and clean.

✔️Non-Slip BOTTOM DESIGN: Non-slip bottom design with silicone gel surface, it can be firmly fixed on the seat without sliding, plus there is a retractable buckle design fixed firmly with the seat to keep the mat stable and not slip when driving.

✔️ MAKE EVERY CHAIR COMFORTABLE : This orthopedic seat cushion nicely fits in most of the chairs. Take it with you in your car, truck,plane, train, office, or anywhere you have to seat for a long time. The handle on the sides allows for convenient carrying. Great for travelers, office going individuals and pregnant women.

✔️Amazing Gift : A amazing birthday or Christmas gift for family, friends and pregnant women. Relieve sciatica, arthritis, lower back, buttocks, spine, post-operative injuries or pregnancy pain relief.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and effective
reviews.reviewText: I love this seat cushion. Perfect for my butt and adds a little prop up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best car seat cushion EVER
reviews.reviewText: I love this car seat cushion. It is so well made. The picture on Amazon does not do it justice!This cushion is well made and it does lift you up so I can see better out the car window.It is so comfortable you won’t believe it!You will love it!You won’t be disappointed with this buy!Update! 10/21/2023Still love it and it has reduced my hip pain 98%!!!You won’t be disappointed!💕***Update & Clarification ***10/28/2023The reason I said my hip pain had improved 98% is because I owned a SUV that broke down and because of the prices of SUV’s I had to purchase a sedan.This had caused extreme hip pain and stiffness for hours and hours after driving it.Once I purchased this car seat pillow my hip pain improved 98%.I am very satisfied with this purchase. The gentleman’s review video really helped me to decide to purchase! Thank you for your video!You won’t be disappointed with this product 💕

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Awesome seat bought for car but tried it with my computer chair, I'm totally in love with it, feels good on your butt, may have to buy another for car. Don't need to hesitate to buy, you won't be sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helped On Long Road Trip
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for a 1,700 roundtrip road trip. We have a Ram Promaster that we converted into a camper. Our seats are tall because we put in a swivel device. The seats are not very comfortable and my husband and I both decided we needed to do something to save our butts on our long road trip. I really like the feel of this cushion. It does add a little more height to our already high seats than I would like, but if we had a regular type of seat, I don't think it would be that noticeable. We both felt the ride was much better because of this cushion. I didn't have the leg pain that I normally have on long trips. It is has a strap that locks it into place. My husband didn't use that, but I did. It could easily be used to a camping chair when we are sitting outside. I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Car seat cushion
reviews.reviewText: Getting short with age, need a slight boost and this work well. Had tried another one and was too high and moved a lot, it looks attractive and good quality, very comfortable, easy to attach

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I questioned on buying it. Then I got it, and was amazed. It's perfect and amazing I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pros and Cons
reviews.reviewText: I have lower back pain from an auto accident but I need to work so I looked at various cushions as I was having problems sitting at work.This cushion would be perfect if it was thicker on the narrow end. I realize it is more geared towards car use than office chair. I do use it facing either way at work.I prefer it the direction it is meant to be used in but I slide forward and have to use the footrest under my desk. Otherwise the density of the thick end is perfect for my back. It is firm but just the right firmness for me.I like the clip on the back of the cushion. I keep it clipped to my office chair so housekeeping doesn't drop it when they come in at night although it is pretty skidproof.It would be nice if the elastic was a little longer because I usually have to pull it forward another 2" so I'm not sliding forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally - A Seat Cushion that Fits!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a seat cushion that would fit my car and/or truck seats that would help making driving comfortable again. I have 5 ruptured discs in my lower back and find it very hard to be comfortable driving for very long with the way bucket seats are designed. This was my 4th and I'm very glad to say final try as this is PERFECT!!
